product_name: Blackburn Flea 2.0 USB Front Bike Light
long_description: Small and bright, the Blackburn Flea 2.0 USB front bike light offers easy mounting and a rechargeable design for convenient use. 4 bright LED bulbs deliver up to 40 lumens of white light to increase your visibility and can be set to 1 of 3 settings: high, normal and flash. Included USB connector uses a magnetic link between the light and USB port to help eliminate the need for cables and ensure highly water-resistant performance. Color-coded battery life indicator is built into the power button: Green = 100% - 75%; Orange = 75% - 25%; Red = 25% - 0% of battery power left. Adjustable rip-and-stick strap allows the Flea 2.0 USB front bike light to be mounted securely to a number of places, including your handlebar or helmet.
